hero.title: Stay Connected,
hero.subtitle: We believe travel should be about freedom, not finding Wi-Fi. We're here to make global connectivity simple, affordable, and instant with eSIMs. No more plastic, no more fees, just pure connection.

saily.title: Meet Saily, Our Trusted Partner
saily.subtitle: We've teamed up with Saily to bring you flawless, affordable connectivity in over 200 destinations. Here's why we trust them to keep you connected on your travels.

built_for_travelers.title: Built for Travelers
built_for_travelers.description: Saily is a global eSIM service designed for travelers. It offers flexible data plans, a super quick setup, and 24/7 chat support to ensure you always have smooth, reliable internet.

backed_by_best.title: Backed by the Best
backed_by_best.description: Saily is owned by Nord Security, the digital security experts behind NordVPN and NordPass. Your connection isn't just simple-it's also incredibly secure.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To help you travel stress-free with simple, affordable eSIMs. Ditch the roaming fees and stay connected anytime, anywhere. Your adventure is the priority.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the obvious choice for travelers who want freedom and convenience. With eSIM tech, we're making every journey easier and more connected.

global_coverage.title: Global Coverage
global_coverage.description: Instant connection in over 190 countries. Your phone just works.

simple_instant.title: Simple & Instant
simple_instant.description: Get your eSIM in minutes. Scan a QR code and you're online.

fair_prices.title: Fair Prices
fair_prices.description: No hidden fees, no roaming charges. Just transparent, affordable data.

cta.title: Ready to Roam Free?
cta.subtitle: Explore plans for your next destination and experience connectivity the way it should be.
